level.heading: Application to Indian tribes.
level.text: A child-custody proceeding that pertains to an Indian child as defined in the Indian Child Welfare Act of 1978, approved November 8, 1978 (92 Stat. 3069; 25 U.S.C. ยง 1901 et seq.), is not subject to this chapter to the extent that it is governed by the Indian Child Welfare Act of 1978.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-293, see notes following ยง 16-4601.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 104 of the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (1997 Act). See 9, Part IA, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
